text: Rauman Lukko Naiset is the representative women's ice hockey team of the ice hockey and ringette club Lukko, based in Rauma, Finland. They play in the Naisten Liiga, the premier women's hockey league in Finland, where they have competed since gaining promotion in the 2016–17 Naisten Liiga qualifiers. The team has faced relegation three times in their four seasons in the Naisten Liiga but have saved themselves in the Karsintasarja each time. Lukko has not made its debut in the Naisten Liiga playoffs as of 2020. == Players and personnel == === 2020–21 roster === Updated 3 September 2020 === Current team personnel === * Head Coach: Marko Toivonen * Assistant Coach: Jerri Pelkonen * Assistant Coach: Sami Piilikangas * Team Manager: Elina Saarenmaa * Equipment Managers: Niclas Kiviö & Sami Koskinen === Team captaincy history === *Annika Järvinen, 2014–2016 Mestis *Tiia Koskinen, 2016–2018 *Elviira Ylitalo, 2018–19 *Maija Koski, 2019–present === Head coaches === *Toni Tunturivuori, 2014–15 Mestis *Hannu Roos, 2016–2018 *Marko Toivonen, 2018–present == Notable alumni == Years active with Lukko listed alongside players' names. * Andrea Bevan, 2012–13 Mestis * Erika Kytömaa, 2013–2018 * Janica Laine, 2013–2018 * Cheyann Newman, 2013–14 Mestis * Maija Otamo, 2011–2014 Mestis * Eveliina Suonpää, 2016–2018 * Susanna Tapani, 2016–2018 * Gudrun Vidarsdóttir, 2012–13 Mestis == References == == External links == *Official site (in Finnish) *Team information and statistics from Eliteprospects.com and Eurohockey.com and Hockeyarchives.info (in French) Category:Women's ice hockey in Finland Category:Ice hockey teams in Finland
title: Lukko Naiset
